name: Cyber Cards
description:
Cyber Cards is a card game simulator with a growing number of features:

  • Add Decks
  • Toggle if new decks should have jokers
  • Shuffle decks by clicking them
  • Remove cards by holding the deck
  • Flip cards by clicking them
  • Roll dice
  • Place game pieces
  • Stack chips and cards
  • Multiple tabs
  • Rotate objects
  • Delete Objects
  • And drag around all objects
  • Can save and load in the .ccs format
  • Load a background image

It even has a modding system!

  • Load a .ccm file
  • Create your own mods using the mod tool
  • Play mods for free

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_vCBUcWgw7E
